page.title: 15DURDHAM AND CLIFTON DOWNS
page.content: { The Downs }consist of 441 acres of green space , the largest in Bristol. They are used , especially in summer , by people from all over Bristol for walks , picnics , jogging and just relaxing . Most visitors come to the big events, the fair , the circus and the Bristol Flower Show , which are sited near the main road . But over by the Avon Gorge there are some woods and it is quieter It has been illegal to build here since an Act of Parliament of 1861 . People here feel very strongly it should be preserved , but some said yes to small changes like an adventure playground , small shelters and toilets . One worry was pollution by dogs , as lots of dogs are walked here . Many people thought something should be done but did not know what .
